00029 #ifndef LUBYK_INCLUDE_MIMAS_GLWIDGET_H_
00030 #define LUBYK_INCLUDE_MIMAS_GLWIDGET_H_
00031 
00032 #include "lubyk.h"
00033 using namespace lubyk;

00035 #include "mimas/mimas.h"
00036 #include <QtGui/QWidget>
00037 #include <QtGui/QGraphicsScene>
00038 #include <QtOpenGL/QtOpenGL>

00040 #include <iostream>

00044 
00052 class GLWidget : public QGraphicsView, public ThreadedLuaObject
00053 {
00054   Q_OBJECT
00055   Q_PROPERTY(QString class READ cssClass)
00056 
00057   class OpenGLScene : public QGraphicsScene {
00058   public:
00059     GLWidget *master_;
00060     bool resized_;
00061 
00062     OpenGLScene(GLWidget *master)
00063         : master_(master)
00064         , resized_(false)
00065     {}
00066 
00067     virtual void drawBackground(QPainter *painter, const QRectF &rect) {
00068       master_->initializeGL();
00069       if (resized_) {
00070         master_->resizeGL(width(), height());
00071         resized_ = false;
00072       }
00073       master_->paintGL();
00074       // Could we draw 2D stuff with painter also ?
00075       // master_->paint(painter, width(), height());
00076     }
00077   };
00078 
00079   OpenGLScene *gl_scene_;
00080 public:
00081   GLWidget() {
00082     setViewport(new QGLWidget(QGLFormat(
00083             QGL::SampleBuffers
00084             )));
00085     setViewportUpdateMode(QGraphicsView::FullViewportUpdate);
00086     gl_scene_ = new OpenGLScene(this);
00087     setScene(gl_scene_);
00088     
00089     setAttribute(Qt::WA_DeleteOnClose);
00090     // get focus on tab and click
00091     setFocusPolicy(Qt::StrongFocus);
00092     MIMAS_DEBUG_CC
00093   }   
00094 
00095   ~GLWidget() {
00096     MIMAS_DEBUG_GC
00097   }
00098 
00099   void addWidgetToScene(QWidget *widget, float x=0, float y=0) {
00100     gl_scene_->addWidget(widget);
00101     widget->move(x, y);
00102     widget->show();
00103   }
00104 
00105   QString cssClass() const {
00106     return parent() ? QString("glwindow") : QString("glwidget");
00107   }
00108 
00109   QSize size_hint_;
00110   // =============================================================
00111 
00112   void updateGL() {
00113     gl_scene_->update();
00114   }
00115 
00116 protected:
00119   void resizeEvent(QResizeEvent *event) {
00120     gl_scene_->resized_ = true;
00121     gl_scene_->setSceneRect(QRect(QPoint(0, 0), event->size()));
00122     QGraphicsView::resizeEvent(event);
00123   }
00124 
00125   virtual void initializeGL() {
00126     lua_State *L = lua_;
00127 
00128     if (!pushLuaCallback("initializeGL")) return;
00129     // <func> <self>
00130     int status = lua_pcall(L, 1, 0, 0);
00131 
00132     if (status) {
00133       fprintf(stderr, "Error in 'initializeGL' callback: %s\n", lua_tostring(L, -1));
00134     }
00135   }
00136 
00137   virtual void resizeGL(int width, int height) {
00138     lua_State *L = lua_;
00139 
00140     if (!pushLuaCallback("resizeGL")) return;
00141     lua_pushnumber(L, width);
00142     lua_pushnumber(L, height);
00143     // <func> <self> <width> <height>
00144     int status = lua_pcall(L, 3, 0, 0);
00145 
00146     if (status) {
00147       fprintf(stderr, "Error in 'resizeGL' callback: %s\n", lua_tostring(L, -1));
00148     }
00149   }
00150 
00151   virtual void paintGL() {
00152     lua_State *L = lua_;
00153 
00154     if (!pushLuaCallback("paintGL")) return;
00155     // <func> <self>
00156     int status = lua_pcall(L, 1, 0, 0);
00157 
00158     if (status) {
00159       fprintf(stderr, "Error in 'paintGL' callback: %s\n", lua_tostring(L, -1));
00160     }
00161   }
00162

00167   void keyPressEvent(QKeyEvent *event) {
00168     keyboard(event, true);
00169   }
00170 
00171   void keyReleaseEvent(QKeyEvent *event) {
00172     keyboard(event, false);
00173   }

00216   void keyboard(QKeyEvent *event, bool isPressed) {
00217     lua_State *L = lua_;
00218 
00219     if (!pushLuaCallback("keyboard")) return;
00220     lua_pushnumber(L, event->key());
00221     lua_pushboolean(L, isPressed);
00222     lua_pushstring(L, event->text().toUtf8());
00223     // <func> <self> <key> <on/off> <utf8>
00224     int status = lua_pcall(L, 4, 0, 0);
00225 
00226     if (status) {
00227       fprintf(stderr, "Error in 'keyboard' callback: %s\n", lua_tostring(L, -1));
00228     }
00229   }
00230 };
